summary.span: 傳回表示這個矩陣的字串。

span.span: Returns a string that represents this matrix.
The string representation of this matrix.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用目前的文化特性的慣例格式化數字的值在傳回的字串。The numeric values in the returned string are formatted by using the conventions of the current culture. 例如，EN-US 文化特性，傳回的字串可能會顯示為`{ {M11:1.1 M12:1.2} {M21:2.1 M22:2.2} {M31:3.1 M32:3.2} }`。For example, for the en-US culture, the returned string might appear as `{ {M11:1.1 M12:1.2} {M21:2.1 M22:2.2} {M31:3.1 M32:3.2} }`.
